terms_link: By registering, you agree to our terms of service
terms_prompt:
1. Acceptance of Terms
By using this application, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions.

2. Changes to Terms
We reserve the right to change these terms at any time. Any modifications will be posted on the application.

3. Use of the Application
You agree to use the application only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms.

4. Privacy
We respect your privacy. Please refer to our privacy policy for details on how we collect and use your information.

5. User Responsibilities
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information, including your password.

6. Account Termination
We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account if you violate these terms.

generic_error: An error occurred. Please try again.
life_coaching_desc: Personalized sessions focused on personal growth, skill enhancement, and achieving life goals under specialized guidance.
life_vip_massage_desc: Indulge in a premium 2-hour massage experience meticulously designed to rejuvenate the body and mind.
life_deep_tissue_massage_desc: Experience deep muscle relief with this therapeutic massage targeting the deeper layers of tissues, perfect for relieving tension and improving mobility.
life_deep_tissue_massage_90_min_desc: Extend the benefits of deep tissue therapy with a prolonged 90-minute session, providing comprehensive muscle relaxation and tension relief.
pre_postpartum_massage_desc: Gentle massages tailored to support mothers during pregnancy and postpartum, promoting relaxation and overall well-being.
relaxation_swedish_massage_desc: Unwind with a classic Swedish massage, featuring gentle strokes to induce relaxation and relieve stress.
sports_massage_desc: Optimize athletic performance and aid recovery with a specialized sports massage targeting muscle groups prone to tension and fatigue.
onlogical_massage_desc: Gentle therapeutic massage tailored to relieve discomfort and promote relaxation for individuals undergoing cancer treatment.
foot_spa_massage_desc: Revitalize your feet with a relaxing spa treatment combined with reflexology massage, promoting balance and relaxation throughout the body.
muscle_massage_desc: Specialized therapeutic massage aimed at rehabilitating muscles, enhancing flexibility, and promoting overall muscular health.
therapy_temporomandibular_joint_dysfunct: Therapeutic massage targeted to alleviate symptoms associated with temporomandibular joint dysfunction, promoting jaw mobility and comfort.
craniasacral_therapy_desc: Gentle hands-on therapy focusing on releasing tension and promoting relaxation throughout the body, particularly beneficial for stress-related conditions.
low_back_pain_desc: Personalized therapeutic massage aimed at lower back pain, designed to relieve discomfort and improve mobility for better daily functioning.
trigger_points_pain_relief_desc: Therapeutic massage focused on trigger points to relieve pain and tension, promoting relaxation and overall well-being.
proprioceptive_neuromuscular_facilitatio: Advanced therapeutic technique aimed at improving muscle function and movement patterns through targeted neuromuscular stimulation.
acupressure_bodywork_desc: Combining traditional acupressure techniques with bodywork for holistic well-being, balancing energy flow and promoting relaxation.
coaching_desc: Receive life coaching from an experienced professional
massage_desc: Enjoy a highly relaxing massage to calm your mind
reflexology_desc: Enjoy a highly relaxing reflexology session to calm your mind
body_treat_desc: Indulge in a rejuvenating body treatment session
lymphatic_drainage_desc: Lymphatic drainage is an advanced therapeutic technique aimed at improving the function of the body's lymphatic system through gentle, targeted manual massage.
scheduling_unavailable: Scheduling is only available from Monday to Friday, or Saturday if you contact directly.
special_attention: To schedule on Saturday, please call the owner manually to confirm.
recent_surgery: Have you had any recent surgery?
booked_success: Appointment successfully booked. Check your email for more details.
answer_all: Please answer all questions before scheduling.
